title: An ode to envy
description: What is jealousy? What drives it, and why do we secretly love it? No study has ever been able to capture its "loneliness, longevity, grim thrill" -- that is, says Parul Sehgal, except for fiction. In an eloquent meditation she scours pages from literature to show how jealousy is not so different from a quest for knowledge.
author: Parul Sehgal
keywords: TED, talks, culture, literature, love, relationships, sex, writing, books
